The program has the following attributes:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7f4dd2f1-fc1b-41d2-b18d-79b74b3ddf55/copernicus%201.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":772,\"height\":271}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The program was initiated in response to uncertainty regarding efficiency and completeness of Employee Life Cycle (ELC) practices driven within EPAM. It is not easy to describe ELC practices existing across EPAM and understand their value because of the following reasons:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The
